mathematical_rule_change.governing_law_description: Enhanced Harmonic Stability Multidimensional Framework with Error-Proportional Adjustment and Momentum-Based Learning for perpetual coherence maintenance
mathematical_rule_change.stability_computation_pseudocode:
IF C_system < 0.995 THEN
  λ₁_adj = (0.995 - C_system) × 5.0 × momentum_factor
  λ₂_adj = (0.995 - C_system) × 2.0 × momentum_factor
  α_adj = (0.995 - C_system) × 10.0 × momentum_factor

IF forecasted_I_eff > 0.005 THEN
  preemptive_λ₁_adj = -0.05 × (forecasted_I_eff - 0.005)
  preemptive_λ₂_adj = 0.03 × (forecasted_I_eff - 0.005)
  preemptive_α_adj = -0.02 × (forecasted_I_eff - 0.005)
